titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the execution of the statutes made against rogues and vagabonds.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at our court at Whitehall, the sixteenth day of February, in the third yeere of our reigne of Great Britaine, France, and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
